title: Beckley - Is Out of The Office
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Beckley - Is Out of The Office
posts.post_content:
Three Hall of Famers on sale for the price of three HOFers.

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10337/beckley[/IMG]

Jake Beckley presents well in a PSA 3 holder with a Sweet Caporal 350 reverse.

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10047/bender-portrait[/IMG]

Chief Bender portrait is offered in a BVG 2.5 holder with a Piedmont 350 reverse

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/24983/duffy-hof[/IMG]

Hugh Duffy can be yours in an SGC 30 holder with a Piedmont 350/460 reverse

All three seem to be fairly graded.  Suit your taste with either a PSA, SGC or BVG holder or mix and match or crack and cross.  Duffy is a little off on T/B centering, but all three are reasonably well centered L/R.  They all present aesthetically well for grades in the G-VG grade.

Asking prices include shipping

BENDER (Portrait)  -  $OLD 

BECKLEY - $OLD


DUFFY - $SOLD

ALL NONE - $000  (just show your Net54 Membership card at checkout;))
